name: Liam
background: A young man who was transformed into a frog by a curse.
motivation: To break the curse and regain his human form.

name: Elara
background: A mysterious woman with a connection to magic.
motivation: To help Liam break the curse and uncover her own past.

name: Zara
background: A sorceress who holds the key to the magical curse.
motivation: To maintain control over the magical realm and its secrets.

name: King Alaric
background: The ruler of the kingdom, concerned about the recent disturbances.
motivation: To ensure the safety of his kingdom and uncover the source of magical disruptions.

name: Queen Isolde
background: The queen with a hidden past, related to the magical world.
motivation: To protect her family and reveal the truth about her lineage.

name: Cedric
background: Liam's best friend who helps him navigate his new life as a frog.
motivation: To support Liam and find a way to reverse the curse.

name: Evelyn
background: An elder witch who knows the secrets of the magical contract.
motivation: To guide Liam and Elara in understanding and breaking the curse.

name: Prince Julian
background: A prince from a neighboring kingdom with interests in Elara.
motivation: To win Elara's affection and secure an alliance with the kingdom.

name: The Oracle
background: A mystical being that foresees the future and gives guidance.
motivation: To maintain the balance of fate and steer the characters toward their destinies.
